Make your donation online or by mail or by fax . Call (212) 998-6950 to make a pledge by phone.               View Cornerstone Society Members List             Donate Online           Download Pledge Form        Plaza ($100–$249)       Panel discussion (1 per year)   Networking breakfast   Schack Institute of Real Estate alumni hat   Honorable mention at Schack alumni events   NYU Alumni Card           Tower ($250–$499)       NYU Young Alumni Leadership Circle (YALC) —For graduates from the last five years.   Panel discussion (1 per year)   Networking breakfast   Schack Institute of Real Estate alumni hat   Honorable mention at Schack alumni events   NYU Alumni Card           Skyscraper ($500–$999)       Alumni Mets Game (1 ticket)   Evening of Monopoly (1 ticket)   NYU Young Alumni Leadership Circle (YALC)—For graduates from the last ten years.   Panel discussion (1 per year)   Networking breakfast   Schack Institute of Real Estate alumni hat   Honorable mention at Schack alumni events   NYU Alumni Card            Metropolis ($1,000–$1,499)       Additional Panel Discussion   (2 per year)   Dean's Circle Membership   Urban Leadership Dinner   (1 ticket)   Alumni Mets Game (1 ticket)   Evening of Monopoly (1 ticket)   NYU Young Alumni Leadership Circle (YALC)—For graduates from the last ten years. Networking breakfast   Schack Institute of Real Estate alumni hat   Honorable mention at Schack alumni events   NYU Alumni Card                    Schack Institute of Real Estate Donors who give at higher levels, as listed below, also become members of the following prestigious NYU Giving Circles .           NYU Society ($2,500–$4,999)       All benefits listed for the Schack Institute of Real Estate Cornerstone Society ( Empire Level )   Invitations to special lectures on campus   Invitations to travel with NYU   Opportunity to have a private campus tour and lunch at the Torch Club             President's Council ($5,000–$9,999)       All benefits listed for the Schack Institute of Real Estate Cornerstone Society ( Empire Level )   Reserved seating at lectures on campus   Invitations to premieres of new works including plays, film, exhibitions, dance performances, readings, and dress rehearsals as available   Invitations to NYU sports events on campus and around the country; invitation to the annual athletics golf outing   Access to NYU’s many programs for alumni and the public on a concierge basis   Alumni dinner with President Sexton in Los Angeles            Global Circle ($10,000–$24,000)       All benefits listed for the Schack Institute of Real Estate Cornerstone Society ( Empire Level )   All President Council Benefits   Personal, behind-the-scenes tour of NYU’s premier library, Bobst Library   Special invitation to participate in international programming at our global sites   Invitation to the Alumni Awards Luncheon           Chairman's Circle ($25,000+)       All benefits listed for the Schack Institute of Real Estate Cornerstone Society ( Empire Level )   All Global Fellows Benefits   Invitations to benefit events at the University   Tours of new University facilities and programs                                                                                                                                         QUICK LINKS                        About Us          Student Affairs          Visit Us          School-wide Policies          Contact Us                       ATTEND THE SCHOOL                        Graduate Admissions          Undergraduate Admissions          Noncredit Registration          Veteran Resource Center                             ON THE WEB                         On Facebook          On Twitter          On YouTube          Browser Requirements                                                        NYU Homepage   © New York University School of Professional Studies | Privacy Policy
